description: This Java source file defines a JwtTokenProvider class responsible for generating and validating JSON Web Tokens (JWTs) within the security component of the application. It includes methods for signing tokens with a secret key, specifying token expiration, and parsing tokens to extract claims.

classes.name: JwtTokenProvider
classes.description: A utility class for creating and validating JWT tokens, integrated as a Spring component.

methods.name: generateToken
methods.description: Creates a signed JWT token with subject and roles, setting expiration based on configuration.

methods.name: parse
methods.description: Parses and validates a JWT token, returning claims if valid.
